titleStmt.title: A table of good nurture: wherin is contained a schoole-masters admonition to his schollers to learne good manners: the father to his chlidren to learne vertue: and the hous-houlder to his seruants to learne godlinesse. To the tune of, The Earle of Bedford.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Good children, refuse not these lessons to learne ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting, each with woodcut at head; the second part has title: The second table of good nurture; to the tune of, Troy towne.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
